overview: Appsoria is aiming to be one of the biggest and fastest growing social gaming firms. At one of the most dynamic gaming markets in the world, Appsoria is targeting an ADU of over 30 million. Appsoria is also the producer of Cap Now Lite and Cap Now Pro. Flashlight App from Appsoria will also be available soon at the App Store.
